name: Konami Kids Playground: Toy Pals Fun with Numbers
synopsis: Toy Pals brings the kinetic excitement of Konami Kids Playground to the playroom! Join Scratch the Cat, Sniff the Dog, Stan the Bear and lots of bunnies in twelve foot-stomping activities that make numbers come to life. Kids will delight in the colorful world of toys, and parents will appreciate the simple challenges that reinforce familiarity with numbers.
